content.prompt: Which of the following best explains colonial governments’ reasons for signing treaties such as that depicted in the image?

choices.label: The desire to prevent conflict caused by colonists’ westward expansion
The determination to maintain the sovereignty of American Indian nations
The need for greater cooperation with rival European powers
The intent to enforce mercantilist policies with American Indian nations
